name: Jean_Leon_0.ckpt
description: This model is based off the artwork of Jean-Léon Gérôme (11 May 1824 – 10 January 1904), a French painter and sculptor in the style now known as academicism. The range of his oeuvre included historical painting, Greek mythology, Orientalism, portraits, and other subjects, bringing the academic painting tradition to an artistic climax, and provides a wonderful painterly Ai style

modelVersions.name: Jean_Leon_0.ckpt
modelVersions.description:
Be sure to start your prompt with: oil paint by jean leon

This version was trained on the entire works of Jean-Léon Gérôme. It should be able to handle most subjects in the style of Jean Leon, but a sample starting prompt that I used for the samples was:

Prompt: masterpiece, best quality, oil paint by jean leon, a beautiful brunet woman in a purple loose tank top standing peacefully in a big open home with big windows, hard morning lighting, house with beautiful plants and scenery, and a tiger and waterfall.

Negative prompt: ugly, frame, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name

Steps: 100, Sampler: DDIM, CFG scale: 7, Seed suggestions: 1424718303, 1424718272, 1424718241 Size: 768x960, Model hash: e5541f03, Batch size: 2, Batch pos: 0, Denoising strength: 0.7, First pass size: 0x0
